Ayush Anand

Ayush Anand is an Artificial Intelligence and Web Developer at India. He is still pursuing High School Studies in the Science Stream (Engineering). He works closely with developers across the globe in evangelizing AI portfolio and solutions, getting together to build understand Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models using Frameworks like Brain, Natural, Tensorflow JS, and visualising data for the good of Humanity.

He has acquired quite an experience in Front-End Technologies in Web Developent as well as Backend Frameworks like Google Firebase, and has been constantly contnuing with untiring efforts in the field since the last 3 years. The latest of his innovations include Alec AI Assist, a Voice enabled chatbot that detect and classify fake news with an accuracy of about 98.79%.

Nightlight AI

NightLight AI is an umbrella project by Ayush Anand, a Web and AI Developer. NightLight AI has been created to serve as a main platform to showcase all AI Projects by him. it countniues to work globally in evangelizing AI portfolio and solutions, getting together to build understand Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models and visualising data for the good of Humanity.
